name: woocommerce
description: WooCommerce is the leading e-commerce plugin for WordPress, enabling self-hosted online stores with products, payments, shipping, and extensions. It powers small shops and large catalogs, and integrates with many third-party services.
features: Product management: Create and organize physical, digital, and variable products with detailed attributes.
Payment gateways: Accept payments through Stripe, PayPal, and dozens of other integrated processors.
Shipping options: Configure shipping zones, rates, and methods including real-time carrier calculations.
Inventory tracking: Monitor stock levels, set low-stock alerts, and manage backorders automatically.
Tax calculation: Automate tax rates based on customer location with support for complex tax rules.
Order management: Process orders, generate invoices, and track fulfillment from a centralized dashboard.
Customer accounts: Allow customers to create accounts, view order history, and save payment methods.
Coupon system: Create discount codes with flexible rules for percentages, fixed amounts, or free shipping.
Analytics reporting: View sales reports, customer data, and product performance metrics over time.
Extension ecosystem: Extend functionality with thousands of plugins for subscriptions, bookings, and more.
Multi-currency: Sell in multiple currencies with automatic conversion and localized pricing.
REST API: Integrate with external systems and mobile apps via comprehensive REST API endpoints.
